pages.title: Black Arowana
pages.text: The black arowana ($(o)Osteoglossum ferreirai$()) is a South American freshwater bony fish of the family Osteoglossidae.$(br2)Black arowanas are sometimes kept in aquariums, but they are predatory and require a very large tank.

pages.title: Black Arowana
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
